sample.name: barcode4j
sample.title: Barcode4J Sample
sample.description: Shows how barcodes could be included in reports using the Barcode4J component.

feature.name: barcodes
feature.title: Barcodes
feature.description: Properties with this prefix introduce JPA implementation specific EJBQL query hints to be used by the JRJpaQueryExecuter. The suffix is the name of the hint, as documented by the specific JPA implementation.

feature.name: barcode4j
feature.title: Barcodes (Barcode4J Custom Component)
feature.description: Properties with this prefix introduce JPA implementation specific EJBQL query hints to be used by the JRJpaQueryExecuter. The suffix is the name of the hint, as documented by the specific JPA implementation.
